The AFL Analytics community is wonderfully inclusive and supportive. If you are looking for discussions about AFL Analytics, I highly reccomend Twitter. There is a very active commnity there. 

## AFL Data
Most of the data I use comes from the following two websites  
[AFL Tables](afltables.com)  
[Footy Wire](footywire.com)  

## AFL Analytics 
Below are some fantastic blogs that I could only dream to be. They create some amazing content week in week out. 

[Matter of Stats](http://www.matterofstats.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MatterOfStats)  
[Analysis of AFL](anoafl.github.io) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/anoafl)  
[The Arc](http://thearcfooty.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/thearcfooty)  
[Squiggle](https://squiggle.com.au/)   
[Hurling People Now](http://www.hpnfooty.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HurlingPeople)  
[The Graft](http://graftratings.com/afl/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/graftratings)
